1.0.name: wordpress/wpcommentcleaner
1.0.description: WPCommentCleaner is a very simple tool which can batch process SPAM, un-apporved and approved comments. I have developed WPCommentCleaner for personal use. Just thought it may come handy to someone else, hence I submitted this plugin to wordpress.org plugin repository.
